mapper.select: SELECT * FROM volunteer v, area a, centertb c WHERE v.vol_area = a.areano AND v.centerno = c.centerno AND volunteerno = #{volunteerno }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO volunteer (volunteerno, centerno, vol_sterm, vol_eterm, stime, etime, department, vol_area, vol_place, receiver, qualification, npeople, vol_title, vol_content, vol_lat, vol_lng, vol_address, area) VALUES (volunteer_seq.nextVal, #{centerno}, #{vol_sterm}, #{vol_eterm}, #{stime}, #{etime}, #{department}, #{vol_area}, #{vol_place}, #{receiver}, #{qualification}, #{npeople}, #{vol_title}, #{vol_content}, #{vol_lat}, #{vol_lng}, #{vol_address}, #{area} )
